byline.original: By MONICA DAVEY, JULIE BOSMAN and MITCH SMITH

abstract: Judge Thomas M Durkin of Federal District Court sentences former House Speaker J Dennis Hastert to 15 months in prison for illegally structuring bank transactions meant to cover up his sexual abuse of boys on high school wrestling team he coached in 1960s and 70s; Hastert, who publicly admitted to abuse for first time during hearing, could not be charged because statute of limitations had run out.
lead_paragraph: The former House speaker faced up to five years for his effort to cover up his sexual abuse of high school wrestlers he coached.

headline.main: Dennis Hastert Sentenced to 15 Months, and Apologizes for Sex Abuse
headline.print_headline: In Court for Cover-Up, Hastert Admits Sex Abuse

snippet: The former House speaker faced up to five years for his effort to cover up his sexual abuse of high school wrestlers he coached.
